relevant_findings.HEENT: Normocephalic and atraumatic, extraocular muscles intact, anicteric
relevant_findings.Heart: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.Lungs: clear to auscultation bilaterally, normal excursion, no respiratory distress
relevant_findings.Back: no vertebral tenderness, no costovertebral tenderness
relevant_findings.Abdomen: soft, slight left lower quadrant tenderness, nondistended, slight mass appreciated in left lower quadrant
relevant_findings.Extremities: WWP, no CCE, no tenderness, 2+ B
relevant_findings.Psychiatric: normal judgment/insight, normal memory, normal mood/affect
